div.p: Should study abroad be a compulsory part of education? Explain your point of view.
It should be but it can't be .why?
Studying abroad is a serious advantage,you improve languages and/or other subjects, you discover other ways of living and being, doing so you enlarge your own personnality, abilities, and knowledges.
This would be desirable for everybody.

But everyone is not able to live such an experiment ; some can't afford the cost of living abroad, health or psychological problems can stop others from travelling . And we must admit that some people are unable to cope with another language and that all jobs don't require languages use.

So to be practical, studying abroad should be compulsory for some jobs : interpreters,diplomats...,highly necessary for a most people :engineers,scientists,secretaries but not compulsory when it is not needed
